ygData.subject: Re: Preparing the Ambush (Hydras and Co.)
ygData.msgSnippet: All of a sudden, Trelos snapped out of his crazed trance and calmly, quietly rejoined Hydras.  He waited for the signal to attack... remaining in beast mode.
